External TMDA Resources

  • TMDA's Project Management Site at Sourceforge

  • The qmail Handbook contains a section describing TMDA

  • tmda_confirm.pl is a Perl script that checks all the CONFIRM messages in the TMDA log file entries for the last $hours hours and pulls out the corresponding Reply-To header for that message from the TMDA pending directory. It then sends a summary to the admin.
